```{r}
library(tidyverse)
```

```{r}
combined_resp_data |> 
 summary()
```

```{r}
combined_resp_data |> 
  filter(flux<10) |> 
  ggplot(aes(ts,flux))+
  geom_point(aes(color = treatment))+
stat_regline_equation(
    aes(label = paste(after_stat(eq.label), ..rr.label.., sep = "~~~~"), color = treatment))
```
```{r fig.width= 8, fig.height=4}
combined_resp_data |> 
  mutate(year = year(date_time))

combined_resp_data |> 
  mutate(date = date(date_time)) |> 
  group_by(date,treatment) |> 
  summarise(mean_flux = mean(flux, na.rm = T)) |> 
  ggplot(aes(date, mean_flux, group = treatment, color = treatment))+
  geom_line(aes(color = treatment))+
  geom_point()+
  scale_x_date(date_breaks = "2 months", date_labels = "%b %Y") 
```




GLMM on the combined data
```{r}
lmm1<- lmer(flux ~ treatment+swc+ts + (1|label), data = combined_resp_data)
summary(lmm1)
```
